title: Top WorldTour Pros Are Coming to Unbound. But Can They Fix a Flat without a Team Car?
content:
The self supported ethos of gravel racing is a world away from the pampered life of pro road racing where mechanics follow close behind with spare wheels and bikes.

Read the full article at Top WorldTour Pros Are Coming to Unbound. But Can They Fix a Flat without a Team Car? on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
